號.definition: ordinal number; day of a month; mark; sign; business establishment; size; ship suffix; horn (wind instrument); bugle call; assumed name; to take a pulse; classifier used to indicate number of people

號令.definition: an order (esp. army); bugle call expressing military order; verbal command

號令如山.definition: lit. order like a mountain; a military order is inviolable; strict discipline

號召力.definition: to have the power to rally supporters

號咷.definition: variant of 號啕|号啕[hao2 tao2]

號哭.definition: to bawl; to wail; to cry

號喪.definition: to weep; to howl as if at a funeral

號子.definition: work chant; prison cell; type; sort; mark; sign; signal; (Tw) brokerage firm

號數.definition: number in a sequence; ordinal number; serial number

號砲.definition: cannon used for signaling; signaling shot

號碼牌.definition: number plate; car license plate; CL:條|条[tiao2],塊|块[kuai4],片[pian4]

號稱.definition: to be known as; to be nicknamed; to be purportedly; to claim (often exaggeratedly or falsely)

號衣.definition: jacket worn esp. by soldiers in former times, with large insignia on the front and back indicating unit affiliation
